column5: Tried a new product by SparyNine called Snow Shooter.Its made to stop snow from sticking to shovels and snow throwers.Spray it on and snow slides right off.Soooo being the curious guy i am, i got up yesterday in the wet snow we had, and sprayed it on the dish. Kept it clear as a whistle !!! Got mine at CT for about 9 bucks.
wouldnt a can of PAM be cheaper??
I've been spraying the top of my downhill skis with silcon for over 4 decades. Pam would probably work as well..
just read the ingredients on the bottle.They have a pancake recipe there
I use the stuff Clark Griswold uses!!
